For the public defense of the
PhD dissertation entitled

quantifying the
uncertainty of
hydraulic model
predictions

Koen D. Berends
Thursday 28 November 2019
At 14:30 (introduction)
and 14:45 (defense)
In the Prof.dr.Berkhoff-room
Of the Waaier building of
the University of Twente
Followed by a reception in
the Waaier
